## commandes utiles
### read grib par Rgrib2 et plot with plot_field  

c'est compris je crois 


```{r pressure,message=FALSE,echo=TRUE,warning=FALSE}
library(Rgrib2)
library(harp)
grib=Rgrib2::Ghandle("~/tmp/AROME/grib_2023020100_0011")
grib_msg=Gdec(grib)
plot_field(grib_msg)
```
### Get a Domain from GRIB With Rgrib2
```{r}
library(Rgrib2)
library(harp)
cams=Rgrib2::Gopen("~/SAVE/LIMA/Cams/Aerosols.grib")
cams
cams=Ghandle("~/SAVE/LIMA/Cams/cams-arome.grib")
cams_dom=Rgrib2::Gdomain(cams)
cams_dom
```
